verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Flooding my soul with glory divine:
Hallelujah, I am rejoicing,
Singing His praises,
Jesus is mine.

verse.name: v1a
v1b
verse.lines:
Jesus has said
"I'll never forsake thee".
Promise divine that never can fail.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Shadows around me,
shadows above me,
Never conceal my Saviour
and Guide;

verse.name: v2b
v3a
v3b
verse.lines:
Singing His praises
gladly I’m walking,
Walking in sunlight,
sunlight of love.
